```{python}
import pandas as pd

```

differential gene expression 
```{r}
# Create ExpressionSet object
eset <- ExpressionSet(assayData = data.matrix(gxData), phenoData = AnnotatedDataFrame(sampleInfo))

design <- model.matrix(~0+Disease, data = pData(eset))

# Create a contrasts matrix
cm <- makeContrasts(status = DiseaseDCM - DiseaseDonor, levels = design)

# Fit the model
fit <- lmFit(eset, design)

# Fit the contrasts
fit2 <- contrasts.fit(fit, contrasts = cm)

# Calculate the t-statistics for the contrasts
fit2 <- eBayes(fit2)

# Summarize results
diffExpr_toptable <- topTable(fit2, adjust = "BH", number = nrow(gxData))
diffGenExpr <- decideTests(fit2, adjust.method = "BH", p.value = 0.05, lfc = 1)
summary(diffGenExpr)
```
